trans-unit.source: Provides listener-channel notifications from protocol handlers to the worker process framework.
Also enables protocol handlers to access additional parameters, such as the ID of the listener channel.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Retrieves data that the protocol manager will pass to a listener channel when the protocol manager is starting that listener channel.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetBlob%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The data that will be passed to the listener channel.
The amount of data, in bytes, that is in the buffer.
Gets the size of the buffered data in the listener channel.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetBlobLength%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The size, in bytes, of the data that is in the listener channel buffer.
Gets the ID of a listener channel that has to be started.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.GetId%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The ID of the listener channel.
Notifies the worker process framework that a new message was received.
This method supports the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportMessageReceived%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Notifies the worker process framework that a listener channel has started.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportStarted%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Notifies the worker process framework that a listener channel has stopped.
<xref:System.Web.Hosting.IListenerChannelCallback.ReportStopped%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The HRESULT value that reports the status of a listener channel.
